verses.roman:
ānandita hañā bhaṭṭa dila divyāsana
āpane karila prabhura pāda-prakṣālana

synonyms: ānandita hañā—becoming pleased; bhaṭṭa—Vallabha Bhaṭṭācārya; dila—gave; divya-āsana—a nice sitting place; āpane—personally; karila—did; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; pāda-prakṣālana—washing of the feet.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu arrived at his home, Vallabha Bhaṭṭācārya, being greatly pleased, offered the Lord a nice sitting place and personally washed His feet.
